author: Anne Bretts
title: Top Transactions: Lake site sold once Lyle Berman’s former home was gone
text: Apartment Sales Tracker Home / Top Transactions / Top Transactions: Lake site sold once Lyle Berman’s former home was gone This Lake Minnetonka shoreline at 433 Bushaway Road in Wayzata sat on the market for years before an old home owned by Lyle Berman was torn down and buyers could see its potential. (Submitted photo: Ellen DeHaven) Top Transactions: Lake site sold once Lyle Berman’s former home was gone By: Anne Bretts October 12, 2015 7:02 am 0 Editor’s note: The Top Transactions feature focuses on the latest top home sales in the Twin Cities area. Finance & Commerce checks certificates of real estate value filed for residential transactions as well as data from the Northstar Multiple Listing Service, county records and other sources. Copies of the CRVs are available here. 433 Bushaway Road, ...
